SummaryEnglish: A collection of short stories, ranging from soap opera (the Ami series) to fantasy (Rall series) to horror (Cream Lemon Dark) to parody (Pop Chaser).

1.SummaryEnglish: Neal, a traveling painter, and Ned, a seminarian, have to spend the night in a mysterious castle.

2.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon 3rd Anniversary Commemoration Special: Graduation Album - Cream Lemon Best Scenes Collec
2.SummaryEnglish: Compilation of erotic scenes from the first three years of Cream Lemon, with some new footage.

3.SummaryEnglish: This special contains the sex scenes from parts 1 and 2.

4.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Young Love - Angie & Rose
4.SummaryEnglish: Toshiya travels to Canada and meets his uncle's family, including his beautiful aunt Rose and his cousin Angie.

5.SummaryEnglish: A music video depicting Ami being scouted and debuting as an idol singer and model.

6.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Return to Black Cat Manor
6.SummaryEnglish: Thirty years after his shocking experience there, Murakami returns to Black Cat Manor, again answering a newspaper advert.

7.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon Omnibus: Ami - Youth Gravity
7.SummaryEnglish: Compilation of the first three Ami episodes.

8.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon Omnibus: Don't Do It, Mako-chan - Mako Sexy Symphony Omnibus
8.SummaryEnglish: Compilation of the two Mako episodes.

9.SummaryEnglish: Compilation of the first three Escalation episodes.

10.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon Omnibus: Festival - Tō Moriyama Masterpiece Selection
10.SummaryEnglish: Compilation of the three episodes written and directed by manga artist Tō Moriyama.

11.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Ami - From Then On Part 1 ~In Sadness~
11.SummaryEnglish: Three years after "Ami III", Ami prepares to hold her first concert. She is enthusiastic, but her heart is still dominated by thoughts of her step-brother, Hiroshi.

12.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Ami - From Then On Part 2 ~I Want to Forget~
12.SummaryEnglish: After learning that Hiroshi is getting married, Ami wants to cancel her concert, but Kōno, who is her new producer, orders her to continue.

13.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Ami - From Then On Part 3 ~I Want to be Held~
13.SummaryEnglish: Kōno proposes to Ami to get married after the concert, and following a meeting with Hiroshi, she accepts.

14.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Ami - From Then On Part 4 Finale ~In a Smile~
14.SummaryEnglish: During the concert, Ami sorts out her feelings, and afterwards makes a decision about her life.

15.TitleEnglish: Going on a Journey: Ami Final Chapte
15.SummaryEnglish: After debuting as an idol singer and model, Ami ponders her future and her relationships with Kōno, Hiroshi, and her step-mother.

16.SummaryEnglish: In the dormitory of an all-girls' Catholic school, the students explore their sexuality through lesbian S&M orgies.

17.SummaryEnglish: 17-year-old high school girl Ami Nonomura and her 20-year-old brother Hiroshi have a secret they can't reveal to their parents or even their best friends.

18.SummaryEnglish: On her 18th birthday, Ami Nonomura wants to meet her father and brother who live far away. While searching for her brother's house, she is attacked by a thief, but is rescued by Hiroshi Tazaki. They fall in love but discover they are actually siblings.

19.SummaryEnglish: 17-year-old high school girl Ami Nonomura and her older brother Hiroshi, a photographer, are drawn into a sexual relationship.

20.SummaryEnglish: Ami Nonomura and her brother Hiroshi's parents die suddenly. A year later, Ami is living with Hiroshi and his wife Mariko. They look like a happy family at first glance, but there is tension after Mariko grows suspicious of Ami and Hiroshi's relationship.

21.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Another Day of Ami
21.SummaryEnglish: Ami Nonomura lives with her aunt, taking care of her half-brother Hiroshi. Hiroshi has become mentally unstable after the death of his sister Mami, but gradually recovers with Ami's help. One day, Ami learns Mami and Hiroshi had a forbidden love affair, culminating in Mami getting pregnant and committing suicide.

22.SummaryEnglish: High school girl Ami Nonomura, who was raised in China and excels in swimming, returns to Japan due to her mother's remarriage and meets her new step-brother Hiroshi, a stupid layabout with a penchant for voyeurism.

23.SummaryEnglish: Wheelchair-bound 16-year-old Arisa reunites with her half-brother Masaki, a college student, for the first time in three years. She lives with her mother Reiko and their maid Aya. A complicated relationship unfolds between the four.

24.SummaryEnglish: A genius AI scientist, expelled from academic society, secretly continues his research to revive his brain-dead younger sister.

25.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon - Don't Do It, Mako-chan
25.SummaryEnglish: Mako, an aspiring manga author who has no romantic experience and can't draw a realistic depiction of sex, begins writing a story to win a rookie award, but feels the limits of her talent. Nene, an exchange student living at Mako's house, makes her an offer: "Let's practice".

26.SummaryEnglish: High school girl Aya comes to Tokyo from Nagano on a field trip. During her free time she visits her step-brother who was separated from her after their parents' divorce. Aya feels conflicted by her feelings about him even though she already has a boyfriend.

27.SummaryEnglish: Long ago, demons invaded Earth. Elves used magic to seal away the Demon Lord, but evil is still leaking through. It's up to Mel, the last surviving elf, to get rid of the demons once and for all.

28.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Toshiki Yui Best Hit - Impressions of Europe
28.SummaryEnglish: The heroine, who is sightseeing in Europe, falls victim to various strange calamities.

29.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Kei Amagi Best Hit - Cherry Melancholy
29.SummaryEnglish: Masahiko and Tomomi failed consummating their first sexual experience, so they receive an introduction to sex from their upperclassmen.

30.TitleEnglish: Cream Lemon: Tō Moriyama Best Hit - It May Be So
30.SummaryEnglish: A teenage boy finds a loaded handgun in a park and uses it to rape women and threaten people into performing sexual acts.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ami Nonomura is a schoolgirl in love with her step-brother Hiroshi. While Ami's mother is away on a business trip

3.SummaryEnglish: The witch Ramorue, who intends to take over the entire universe, invades the planet Rall and abducts the princess of the planet to obtain the legendary sword "Reverse",

4.SummaryEnglish: Arriving at the quiet town of Neo Cansas, Rio lodges herself at the Sailor Uniform Saloon, the only bar/hotel around. Mai, a waitress who works at the saloon, asks Rio to deal with a gang that is terrorizing town

7.TitleEnglish: Don't Do It Mako! Mako Sexy Symphony Part I

12.TitleEnglish: Don't Do It Mako! Mako Sexy Symphony Part II

13.TitleEnglish: Ami III: Now I Embrace You Ami

15.TitleEnglish: Superdimension SF Legend Rall 2: Lamu Ru Strikes Back

3.SummaryEnglish: After eight years, the first in a brief new age of Cream Lemon OVAs made its appearance, with another following the year after. The episodes are connected to the "Escalation" and "Ami" series.

1.TitleEnglish: New Century Cream Lemon: Escalation - Die Liebe
1.SummaryEnglish: An alternate ending to the original Escalation series. Tomoe is a new student at the Catholic school. She attempts to run away from the dormitory, but is saved from being caught by her upperclassman Rie. The girls begin to closely bond, and Tomoe finds herself being initiated into S&M sessions with Rie, Midori, and Naomi.

2.TitleEnglish: New Century Cream Lemon: Ami Rencontrer" Transliteration
2.SummaryEnglish: Ami begins a sexual relationship with her step-brother, Hiroshi. The relationship between the two becomes known to her stepmother, and Ami is separated from Hiroshi, who is sent to study in London. The vulnerable Ami later attracts the attention of Mr. Kinoshita, a handsome new substitute teacher at her school. "Ami Rencontrer" is an alternative sequel to the first two Ami episodes from the original Cream Lemon series, "Be My Baby" and "Ami Again".

1.TitleEnglish: New Generation Vol. 1: Ami Part 1 - I My Me
1.SummaryEnglish: Three years after "Ami III", Ami prepares to hold her first concert. She is enthusiastic, but her heart is still dominated by thoughts of her step-brother, Hiroshi.

2.TitleEnglish: New Generation Vol. 2: Instant Beauties for Every Taste
2.SummaryEnglish: Student Ken buys three defective artificial girlfriends, which complicates his relationship with his beautiful neighbor Sora.

3.TitleEnglish: New Generation Vol. 3: Ami Part 2 - Once More...
3.SummaryEnglish: Kōno proposes to Ami to get married after the concert, and following a meeting with Hiroshi, she accepts.

4.TitleEnglish: New Generation Vol. 4: Creature Buster" Transliteration
4.SummaryEnglish: During the concert, Ami sorts out her feelings, and afterwards makes a decision about her life.
